billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Enacts the "city of Buffalo historic preservation tax credit act"
summary: Enacts the "city of Buffalo historic preservation tax credit act"; such credit shall be equal to thirty percent of the qualified rehabilitation expenditures made by the taxpayer upon completion of a rehabilitation work and approval of such work.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to enacting the "city of Buffalo historic preservation tax credit act"
